code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import ScreenHeading from"../../utilities/ScreenHeading/ScreenHeading";import ScrollService from"../../utilities/ScrollService";import Animations from"../../utilities/Animations";import"./AboutMe.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AboutMe(props){var fadeInScreenHandler=function fadeInScreenHandler(screen){if(screen.fadeScreen!==props.id)return;Animations.animations.fadeInScreen(props.id);};var fadeInSubscription=ScrollService.currentScreenFadeIn.subscribe(fadeInScreenHandler);var SCREEN_CONSTANTS={description:"With having experience of 2 internships as a Web developer intern at Exposys Data Labs and Odoo Development intern at Beyon Data Solutions, I am adept in programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, Front-end technologies and Backend Development tools. I used the DBsqlite database to create a blogging and e-commerce website. The project uses Bootstrap, Jquery, HTML, and CSS. The Django Framework is used for back-end development, and I created an odoo-based university administration system with a display layer that combines HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS, a logic tier that is entirely built in Python, and a data tier that only supports PostgreSQL as an RDBMS.Apart from that I have worked on different technologies like Springboot,JAVA,nosql,AWS",highlights:{bulltes:["Full stack mobile and web development","Interactive Front end as per the design","React and React native","Odoo Development ","Building Rest Api","Managing Database"],heading:"Here are a few highlights:"}};var renderHighlight=function renderHighlight(){return SCREEN_CONSTANTS.highlights.bulltes.map(function(value,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"highlight",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"highlight-blob"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:value})]},i);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-me-container screen-container",id:props.id||"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-parent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScreenHeading,{title:"About Me",subHeading:"Why Choose Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-me-profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"about-me-description",children:SCREEN_CONSTANTS.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-highlights",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"highlight-heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:SCREEN_CONSTANTS.highlights.heading})}),renderHighlight()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-me-options",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"Resume-Urmil.pdf",download:"Resume-Urmil.pdf",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn highlighted-btn",children:"Get Resume"})})})]})]})]})});}
